statements: SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE transaction_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND payment_amount > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_payments > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM Payments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_date, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'summary';
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, user_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN reports ON transactions.user_id = reports.user_id WHERE transactions.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, last_activity_date FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_description FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, last_activity_date FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM reports ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY revenue_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'comment' ORDER BY engagement_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.revenue_amount, r.revenue_date FROM users u INNER JOIN revenue r ON u.user_id = r.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_date FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 2005 AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT source, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_tracking GROUP BY source;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT revenue_amount, source FROM revenue_tracking WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_date FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Like' OR engagement_type = 'Share' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT activity_type, user_id FROM dashboard_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id, activity_date DESC LIMIT 20;
